title: How to Make Cherry Lemonade

steps.headline: Cut the lemon into two halves.
steps.description: Squeeze out all of the juice.

steps.headline: Place the cherries into a saucepan.
Add sugar and pour in the freshly squeezed lemon juice.
Over a medium heat, simmer the ingredients.
Stir the mixture until it forms a syrup.
Pour the strained syrup into bottle(s).
Top up with the mineral water.
Place in the fridge for at least an hour.

text: Wash and pit the cherries.  Cut the cherries in halves.  Cut the lemon into two halves. Squeeze out all of the juice. Place the cherries into a saucepan.  Add sugar and pour in the freshly squeezed lemon juice.  Over a medium heat, simmer the ingredients.  Stir the mixture until it forms a syrup.  Strain through a sieve.  Pour the strained syrup into bottle(s).  Top up with the mineral water.  Place in the fridge for at least an hour.  Serve chilled!
